thread.section_title: Albergo del Senato - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect location and amazing staff
thread.title_full: Perfect location and amazing staff - Review of Albergo del Senato, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: happyt0urist
title: Perfect location and amazing staff
text: The location cannot be beat. You are steps from everything. The rooms are clean and the breakfast is quite good. The staff makes the hotel. Every person was helpful, warm and kind. Their goal was to make your visit perfect and they succeeded.
